newsitem.title: USA: Texas/w Okla feedlot cattle trade at $72 - USDA.
newsitem.headline: Texas/w Okla feedlot cattle trade at $72 - USDA.

text.p: Trade was active in the Panhandle area Thursaday, USDA said. Slaughter steers and heifers were $1.00 higher. Feedlots reporting strong inquiry from buyers.
Sales reported on 18,500 slaughter steers and 8,400 heifers; 192,700 head confirmed for week to date which includes 15,300 formulated cattle to be shipped this week.
Note - all cattle prices based on net weights FOB the feedlot after a 4 percent shrink.
Slaughter Steers - Select and Choice 2-3 1150-1250 lbs 72.00. Select, few Choice 2-3 1150-1250 lbs 70.00-71.00.
Slaughter Heifers - Select and Choice 2-3 1050-1150 lbs 72.00. Select, few Choice 2-3 1050-1100 lbs 71.00. Pen Select, few Choice 2-4 1150 lbs including heiferettes 70.00.
Confirmed - 26,900 Week Ago - None Year Ago - 8,300
Wk to date - 192,700 Week Ago - 20,400 Year Ago - 76,200
